original_text:
“But let no one bring a charge,
    let no one accuse another,
for your people are like those
    who bring charges against a priest.
korean_text: 그러나 어떤 사람이든지 다투지도 말며 책망하지도 말라 네 백성들이 제사장과 다투는 자처럼 되었음이니라

sentences.original_text: But let no one bring a charge
for your people are like those
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네 백성들이 그들과 같기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: who bring charges against a priest
